XIII.i.2.A.3.a
.
Referring Automobile or Adaptive Equipment Claims to the Rating Activity
If prior rating decisions do
not
establish the existence of a qualifying SC disability, refer the claim to the rating activity following completion of any necessary development.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Automobile and Adaptive Equipment Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. Chapter 39
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
